## FieldArrayMethodProps type

`useFieldArray` focus option, ability to toggle focus on and off with `shouldFocus` and setting focus by either field index or name.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type FieldArrayMethodProps = {
    shouldFocus?: boolean;
    focusIndex?: number;
    focusName?: string;
};
```
